citrus.general: Prune regularly and monitor weekly for pests.
citrus.aphids: Introduce ladybugs when counts exceed threshold; avoid broad-spectrum insecticides.
citrus.scale: Apply horticultural oil and encourage parasitic wasps.

lettuce.general: Rotate crops and maintain good airflow to reduce disease pressure.
lettuce.aphids: Release lacewings and use reflective mulches.
lettuce.slugs: Use shallow beer traps and nighttime scouting.
